meanings: the law of conservation of mass

vlive.korean: 보존이 잘 되어 있는데... It's preserved well. 듣기 View video Lee Joon Gi : [이준기] 무법로펌에서 만난 변호사 왕, 봉상필!
되게 보존을 잘 해놨죠? They did a great job preserving the place, huh? 듣기 View video 모지티비 : [MADE IN EXID] EXID EP22. 호찌민 중앙우체국투어
vlive.english: They did a great job preserving the place, huh?

vlive.korean: 그게 어떻게 그대로 보존이 됐는지가 정말 신기하지. I'm so amazed how they preserved it all so well. 듣기 View video 졸잼티비 (joLjamTV) : ep8. 여배우의 아침 숙소 엿보기 _ 뷰티스코드3
vlive.english: I'm so amazed how they preserved it all so well.

vlive.korean: [엔씨티즌이라면 영구 보존해야 할 무대 지금 시작...!] 가즈아! [Special stage for NCTzen fans!] Let's go! 듣기 View video 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) : <아이돌룸> 23회 선공개 - NCT127이 추는 '츄잉껌'과 'BOSS' 댄스♪
vlive.english: [Special stage for NCTzen fans!] Let's go!

vlive.korean: 그리고 제 생각엔 그 보존 기간이 다른 팩에 비해서 좀 짧은 거 같아요. I think the expiration date is a bit shorter than other packs. 듣기 View video 카모마일T (Chamomile_T) : 일본 러쉬 LUSH 추천템 쇼핑 하울 소개 / 스킨케어부터 향수까지
vlive.english: I think the expiration date is a bit shorter than other packs.

examples.korean: Their music has been preserved for posterity. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들의 음악은 후세를 위해 보존되어 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Their music has been preserved for posterity. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The paintings were in an excellent state of preservation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 그림들은 보존 상태가 아주 훌륭했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The paintings were in an excellent state of preservation. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The value of antiques will depend on their condition and rarity. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 골동품의 가치는 그 (보존) 상태와 희귀성에 달려 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The value of antiques will depend on their condition and rarity. Add to Wordbook
